package.description: This package provides a template library to design different motion models making possible parametrize the type of the representations of the state, actions and time. For instance the state could consider dynamic variables or not. Moreover the state, actions or time could be represented with a probabilistic description following the Probabilistic Robotic Foundations. From the simplest transition function x_[t+1]=F(x_t,u,Delta t) a set of more complex functions are generated. Including: sample a trajectory, obtain the final state after a set of asynchronous action history, obtain the final state after a set of actions, etc.
